pages.title: Identify your power
pages.text: As soon as you enter the world, you appear with a basic, allomantical or feruchemical power decided by your luck, and if you have really much, you could have one of each type.

$(br) To quickly identify your power, you can press the "M" key (or bound allomantic power selector key) or "N" (or bound feruchemical power selector key), once one of these selectors is displayed, you can easily identify the power of which metal you own.
